g.�You cannot carry any more items. Your inventory is ful
1�I travel......hear lots...Hear...stories... Can tell...if...
1�Do you want to hear a story?No, thank you.Let's hear one.
1�What story would you like to be told?On second thought, maybe later.A Land After Time(pt.1).A Land After Time(pt.2).
1�This empty husk is void of anything that we could call nature.
1�Zi'Tah...yes, I have run across that name several times before.
1�Yes, it was when the master first visited Reisenjima.
1�?[He/She] said there was a sanctuary there, much like one in my homeland.
1�Those chosen by the mothercrystal may enter a holy shrine deep within the Sanctuary to receive the protection of the Dawnmaidens.
1�I had envisioned it to be more bursting with splendor...
1�I do not believe so.
1�If the coming Emptiness is to swallow the world, then I would be more inclined to believe that we are catching a glimpse of what that swallowed world would be like.
t?�A...bell? But where...?
e?�Zeid [/, Lion]! Please, stay with us!
1�You were under its thrall.
1�If the clamoring has ceased, then we may yet find respite.
1�Master, this may be the world we refer to as ??Escha.??
1�I still have much to learn, but your words that day will always stay with me:
1�??When the darkness first came, the Middle Lands were the first to be assaulted. Swaths of land were consumed, leaving a colorless landscape where life once thrived.
1�??It marked the beginning of the end.??
1�And that world, you said, was known as Escha.
1�Yet the annals say that the Emptiness first started to appear many years hence.
1�So why now? Why here?
1�It could be that my returning to your time has placed a stick in the wheel of fate.
1�Has the darkness come with me?
1�Though this may sound counterintuitive, I fear we must change the future if we are to save the past.
1�This empty husk is void of anything that we could call nature.
1�Zi'Tah...yes, I have run across that name several times before.
1�Yes, it was when the master first visited Reisenjima.
1�?[He/She] said there was a sanctuary there, much like one in my homeland.
1�Those chosen by the mothercrystal may enter a holy shrine deep within the Sanctuary to receive the protection of the Dawnmaidens.
1�I had envisioned it to be more bursting with splendor...
1�I do not believe so.
1�If the coming Emptiness is to swallow the world, then I would be more inclined to believe that we are catching a glimpse of what that swallowed world would be like.
t?�A...bell? But where...?
e?�Zeid [/, Lion]! Please, stay with us!
1�You were under its thrall.
1�If the clamoring has ceased, then we may yet find respite.
1�Master, this may be the world we refer to as ??Escha.??
1�I still have much to learn, but your words that day will always stay with me:
1�??When the darkness first came, the Middle Lands were the first to be assaulted. Swaths of land were consumed, leaving a colorless landscape where life once thrived.
1�??It marked the beginning of the end.??
1�And that world, you said, was known as Escha.
1�Yet the annals say that the Emptiness first started to appear many years hence.
1�So why now? Why here?
1�It could be that my returning to your time has placed a stick in the wheel of fate.
1�Has the darkness come with me?
1�Though this may sound counterintuitive, I fear we must change the future if we are to save the past.
1�This empty husk is void of anything that we could call nature.
1�Zi'Tah...yes, I have run across that name several times before.
1�Yes, it was when the master first visited Reisenjima.
1�?[He/She] said there was a sanctuary there, much like one in my homeland.
1�Those chosen by the mothercrystal may enter a holy shrine deep within the Sanctuary to receive the protection of the Dawnmaidens.
1�I had envisioned it to be more bursting with splendor...
1�I do not believe so.
1�If the coming Emptiness is to swallow the world, then I would be more inclined to believe that we are catching a glimpse of what that swallowed world would be like.
t?�A...bell? But where...?
e?�Zeid [/, Lion]! Please, stay with us!
1�You were under its thrall.
1�If the clamoring has ceased, then we may yet find respite.
1�Master, this may be the world we refer to as ??Escha.??
1�I still have much to learn, but your words that day will always stay with me:
1�??When the darkness first came, the Middle Lands were the first to be assaulted. Swaths of land were consumed, leaving a colorless landscape where life once thrived.
1�??It marked the beginning of the end.??
1�And that world, you said, was known as Escha.
1�Yet the annals say that the Emptiness first started to appear many years hence.
1�So why now? Why here?
1�It could be that my returning to your time has placed a stick in the wheel of fate.
1�Has the darkness come with me?
1�Though this may sound counterintuitive, I fear we must change the future if we are to save the past.
1�Lady Lion!
1�Are you the one known as Zeid?
1�Have you any insight, Lion?
t!�I know not what role she has to play, but her intimate bond with the future is beyond denial.
1�Where are we?
1�Are you the one known as Zeid?
1�Master, perhaps Lion could provide us with the guidance that we so desperately require.
1�My understanding is that none resonate with the mothercrystal more strongly than she.
1�Your role in protecting our future is vital, Master, but Lion is of equal importance.
1�She is with the crystal now, is she not?
1�It gives me chills just thinking about it.
1�It gives me chills just thinking about it.
1�The first thing I noticed about this place is its striking resemblance to the Sanctuary of Zi'Tah, located in northeastern Mindartia.
1�Its layout and features resemble Zi'Tah, of that there can be no doubt. Yet the magic and warmth are gone, like we are in a different world entirely.
1�...Or is this the future?
1�What if...history were being rewritten?
1�You are right. That is rather difficult to wrap my head around.
1�Iroha, is there no way to purge this ??Escha?? from our land?
1�Then only one path lies open to us: figure out what we can for ourselves.
1�As if this land were not dangerous enough, now we have that unholy bell to contend with.
1�The first thing I noticed about this place is its striking resemblance to the Sanctuary of Zi'Tah, located in northeastern Mindartia.
1�Its layout and features resemble Zi'Tah, of that there can be no doubt. Yet the magic and warmth are gone, like we are in a different world entirely.
1�...Or is this the future?
1�What if...history were being rewritten?

1�Then only one path lies open to us: figure out what we can for ourselves.
1�As if this land were not dangerous enough, now we have that unholy bell to contend with.

1�Then only one path lies open to us: figure out what we can for ourselves.
1�As if this land were not dangerous enough, now we have that unholy bell to contend with.
1�Don't let your guard down for a second. This may look like the Sanctuary of Zi'Tah, but it is not the one we know.
1�That is right. And you must be Iroha--Aldo has told me much about you.
1�I knew I had to investigate as soon as I heard something was amiss.
1�The Sanctuary of Zi'Tah...but not the one we know.
1�That is right. And you must be Iroha--Aldo has told me much about you.
1�I knew I had to investigate as soon as I heard something was amiss.
1�Lion?
1�Iroha? Wait!
].�Jump into the vortex?Off we go!Not just yet.

?.�Soon as I set foot in this place I knew I was in fer a treat, but boy, word spreads fast to these adventurer types...
1�Urk... Me? I'm, uh...Affi. And what does an ugly mug like you call yerself?
1� ? Bwahaha, a better adventurer's name I've never heard!
1�Surely you know what the Tenshodo is,  ? Well, they sent me off to what was supposed to be this Goddessfersaken land...but there's far more coin to make out here than I've imagined.
1�So loosen up your purse strings, because I've got sundries aplenty!
1�Aye, I say ??coin to make,?? but that's a bit more metaphori-whatsit than physical. What I'm lookin' fer isn't gil, but a special substance known as ??escha silt.??
1�Dun' worry if you don't have any on you right now. Just go bash some skulls in over yonder, and you'll surely be able to...procure some from the corpses of the fallen.
1�Oho! If it isn't my favorite adventurer. What can I do fer you today?
1�Oho! If it isn't my favorite adventurer. What can I do fer you today?
1�Oho! If it isn't my favorite adventurer. What can I do fer you today?
1�Ah,  , just the ?[guy/girl] I wanna see. And ?[he/she] couldn't have come at a better time!
1�I just got orders from Norg to help put down a rather unusual monster that's  �[supposed to show up/shown up] here in Escha.
1�If yer headed down there to join the fight, I've got somethin' here yer gonna like!
1�Oho! If it isn't my favorite adventurer. What can I do fer you today?

1�What would you like to do?Nothing in particular. �[Receive elvorseal/Return elvorseal].Teleport to the target monster.Check area blessings.Receive key items.View grisly trinket notes.Receive vorseals.Return vorseals.Check vorseal effects.Receive temporary items.Hear various explanations.

1�Everything's got a price, my fine friend, most of all information. Grease my palms with 
� pinches of escha silt and we'll do business.

1�Pay silt? (current silt: 
�)Yes. (pay 
 silt)Maybe not.
1�A pleasure. A bloomin' pleasure.
1�What kinda dunce do you take me fer? That's not nearly enough silt!
1�A bit big for our britches, aren't we? Then let me give you a little tip fer free--don't get killed.
1�Oh right, the area blessings. No problemo, might wanna jot these down so ya remember.
1�These are the blessings currently in effect throughout the area...
1�Which active blessing will you check?None of them. Go back.Temperance.Fortitude.Piety.Justice.Hope.Wisdom.Compassion.Dignity.Loyalty.Mercy.Courage.
1�Temperance: Reduces the silt cost of eschan portals.
1�Fortitude: Increases the status effects of vorseals.
1�Piety: Increases the effect duration of vorseals.
1�Justice: Increases ??Treasure Hunter?? ability by 1.
1�Hope: Increases the chances of an emblazoned reliquary appearing.
1�Wisdom: Increases the effect duration of food.
1�Compassion: Increases the ??Refresh?? and ??Regen?? effects of vorseals.
1�Dignity: Increases escha silt yields.
1�Loyalty: Increases escha beads yields.
1�Mercy: ?5???? and 5???? have a chance of not being consumed.
1�Courage: Increases the ??Rare enemy+?? effects of vorseals.
1�Teleport to the target?I'm ready.Not quite yet.
1�Aye, that's what I wanna hear! One ticket to dragon land, best o' luck!
1�Hmph. Well come back and let me know when you?['ve grown a pair/'re done playin' with yer dolls].
1�First things first, yer gonna need one o' these.
1� �[You feel the warmth of the elvorseal's divine protection./The warmth of the elvorseal fades away.]
e.�Alter egos may be used here without any effect on enmit
1�Ya can have that one fer free!
1�Now there's a lot more to say about that elvorseal. Just ask if ya wanna hear more.
1�With that elvorseal on ya, not only will ya be able to touch Azi Dahaka across the dimensional rift, but ya can teleport directly to 'im.

1�Don' even ask me about dimensional rifts or how this thing works. Someone back at the Tenshodo tried to explain it to me, I was even payin' attention that time and I didn' get a lick of what he was sayin', so I doubt you'd do any better.
1�If yer feelin' ready to take him on, I'll teleport ya there now. What'dya say?
1�What, you ain't gonna fight? Well I ain't gonna blame ya fer valuin' yer life, hah! I'll hold on to this fer now.
1� �[You feel the warmth of the elvorseal's divine protection./The warmth of the elvorseal fades away.]

1�But here's the thing. This baby don't disappear after just one use. Instead, its effects'll last up to one hour, or until you leave Escha.

1�Now don' get me wrong--I'm more'n happy to take that vorseal off you. Just don't come cryin' because its powers have faded away!
1�And if you want it back, well...it'll cost you. Business is business.
